EmailTemplate.name: 02_04_2015 What is Control Video #1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, What is Control?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Are you experiencing true control? Well, to answer that question we have to first understand what control is...and since words have never truly been our strong suit, we're going to let this video do the talking.
<http://vmturbo.com/blog/demand-driven-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=whiteboard_vid&utm_content=02_09_15> Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
